detectors.description: RandomlyAssigned.nextToken() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2d78c5ac66ecbcaf81ad13060b53a399bc78d6aa-MagicHearts.sol#710-744) uses a weak PRNG: value + startFrom (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2d78c5ac66ecbcaf81ad13060b53a399bc78d6aa-MagicHearts.sol#743)

ERC721._exists(uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2d78c5ac66ecbcaf81ad13060b53a399bc78d6aa-MagicHearts.sol#995-997) uses a weak PRNG: _owners[tokenId] != address(0) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2d78c5ac66ecbcaf81ad13060b53a399bc78d6aa-MagicHearts.sol#996)

RandomlyAssigned.nextToken() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2d78c5ac66ecbcaf81ad13060b53a399bc78d6aa-MagicHearts.sol#710-744) uses a weak PRNG: tokenMatrix[random] == 0 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2d78c5ac66ecbcaf81ad13060b53a399bc78d6aa-MagicHearts.sol#723)

RandomlyAssigned.nextToken() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2d78c5ac66ecbcaf81ad13060b53a399bc78d6aa-MagicHearts.sol#710-744) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: random = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender,block.coinbase,block.difficulty,block.gaslimit,block.timestamp))) % maxIndex (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2d78c5ac66ecbcaf81ad13060b53a399bc78d6aa-MagicHearts.sol#712-720)
